guide.introduction: I was recently reserching on LEDs and I stumbled upon this page as I read it I found that LEDs are not just used to emit light but the also have the ability to sense light.At first using LED as light sensor sounds complicated but it quiet quickly becomes

guide.summary: This is a simple arduino project which will show you how to use a LED as a light sensor
guide.title: Light Sensing LEDs
